Title: Legacy - Barton Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Get playful with patterns for almost any space with the Legacy Barton area rug by Amer Rugs. This unique design is exquisitely handcrafted using premium quality wool for long-lasting comfort.

  • Barton features a checked design that alternates between southwestern rug patterns, all rendered in soothing monochromatic blues.
  • Legacy collection area rugs are ideal for casual placements – living rooms, dining rooms, home offices, and more. It's durable enough for high traffic spaces and soft enough for your coziest retreats.
  • This 100% wool rug showcases the best in handcrafted construction with every knot hand-tied by skilled artisans. Every detail is rendered with care for quality you can see and feel.
  • Vacuum using a suction-only setting or hard surface attachment to minimize wear on the wool fibers. Avoid vacuuming over the soft fringe that caps each end.

Title: Blend - Warwick Area Rug
Body (HTML): With its unique colorblock design and a southwestern twist, this rug can fit into a variety of settings. Whether your home is farmhouse or contemporary, this earthy, super plush hand-made rug will ground the room in beauty and design. Hand-woven in India of the finest New Zealand wool with art silk for sheen and added softness.
